author: federicov
content: Is there already an implementation of test block with the new update feature?

author: timbeiko
content: <@!824176824292081664> I'm not sure what you mean, but there is a dev network running 1559 now, Calaveras: https://github.com/ethereum/eth1.0-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/client-integration-testnets/calaveras.md
